name: Constellation Holdings
startIntroPart1: This company began as Darkwater Target Systems, operating out of the swamps of North Carolina, but it has grown remarkably since then. After many years of profitably offering its services as a military contractor and merging with other contractor companies, the organization now known as Constellation Holdings began to establish itself as a full-fledged army, sometimes offering its services for sale and sometimes acting strictly for the company's own internal interests.
startIntroPart2: As interplanetary travel became cheaper and faster, Constellation Holdings set its sights on the stars, eager to acquire the resources of the new frontier. On the harsh landscape of Io, with no humans around to stake their claim, Constellation Holdings is ready to seize whatever it can, and it brings a massive amount of force to bear.
declaringWar: You're currently occupying areas where we intend to expand. If you do not surrender your current claims, we are prepared to take them by force.
attacked: We stand ready and willing to repel any invasion that you attempt.
defeated: We acknowledge your acquisition of our former territories. If you wish to negotiate their sale, please contact our home offices on Earth.
introduction: You've reached the offices of Constellation Holdings. Do you wish to negotiate territory claims?
tradeRequest: This exchange should prove beneficial for the both of us.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>
When defeating a [Barbarian] unit, earn [10] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>

civilopediaText.text: This company began as Darkwater Target Systems, operating out of the swamps of North Carolina, but it has grown remarkably since then. After many years of profitably offering its services as a military contractor and merging with other contractor companies, the organization now known as Constellation Holdings began to establish itself as a full-fledged army, sometimes offering its services for sale and sometimes acting strictly for the company's own internal interests.

As interplanetary travel became cheaper and faster, Constellation Holdings set its sights on the stars, eager to acquire the resources of the new frontier. On the harsh landscape of Io, with no humans around to stake their claim, Constellation Holdings is ready to seize whatever it can, and it brings a massive amount of force to bear.

name: Tycho Crowdfunding
startIntroPart1: As major powers from across Earth sought to scoop up the Solar System's unclaimed wealth, many people saw the struggles taking place and yearned for for an interplanetary order governed more by cooperation than by competition. Small startups and syndicates sprang up that encouraged coordination between companies and equitable distribution of wealth. One organization from Denmark soon emerged as a powerful ally in this quest: Tycho Crowdfunding.
startIntroPart2: Drawing on donations from across the Solar System by people seeking peace among the stars, Tycho Crowdfunding enjoys its greatest successes by helping small companies band together and resist the power of the huge conglomerates that seek to monopolize the wealth of Io and beyond.
declaringWar: You've bullied your fellow companies for too long. It's time for us to push back.
attacked: We're ready to fight for what belongs to us and what belongs to everyone.
defeated: You've defeated us, but don't think that this moon will ever belong to you alone.
introduction: It's good to meet you! We hope that you'll work with us in developing Io.
tradeRequest: Let's work together, for the benefit of all.
uniques: Comment [[+50]% all non-Â¤Data stats from LLCs]
Gain [30] Influence with a [Military] gift to a City-State
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+10] XP

civilopediaText.text: As major powers from across Earth sought to scoop up the Solar System's unclaimed wealth, many people saw the struggles taking place and yearned for for an interplanetary order governed more by cooperation than by competition. Small startups and syndicates sprang up that encouraged coordination between companies and equitable distribution of wealth. One organization from Denmark soon emerged as a powerful ally in this quest: Tycho Crowdfunding.

Drawing on donations from across the Solar System by people seeking peace among the stars, Tycho Crowdfunding enjoys its greatest successes by helping small companies band together and resist the power of the huge conglomerates that seek to monopolize the wealth of Io and beyond.

name: Ex Aerospace
startIntroPart1: With branches in space exploration, human-machine interface technology, clean energy production, autonomous robotics, tunnel construction, and even social media, Ex has long sought to do it all. It was an early major player in the colonization of planets beyond Earth, establishing human settlements on Mars and sending drones out across the Solar System.
startIntroPart2: While Io is unfit for human habitation, its mineral resources make it a promising source of wealth, so Ex Aerospace has come to dig for gold, hoping to fund its ventures even further into space.
declaringWar: You're impeding humanity's progress, and we won't stand for it!
attacked: I don't think you understand who you're dealing with, here.
defeated: We'll come back from this, just you wait and see.
introduction: Hello, and welcome from Ex! Let's accomplish great things together!
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of deal?

civilopediaText.text: With branches in space exploration, human-machine interface technology, clean energy production, autonomous robotics, tunnel construction, and even social media, Ex has long sought to do it all. It was an early major player in the colonization of planets beyond Earth, establishing human settlements on Mars and sending drones out across the Solar System.
While Io is unfit for human habitation, its mineral resources make it a promising source of wealth, so Ex Aerospace has come to dig for gold, hoping to fund its ventures even further into space.

name: Nile Inc
startIntroPart1: What begin as an experimental venture in selling books has grown into a market for everything from small consumer goods to cloud computing. With subsidiaries in industries as diverse as entertainment, automobile manufacturing, and surveillance, Nile seeks to deliver to the world everything it needs, and as humanity has expanded beyond our home world, Nile has expanded to ensure that humans everywhere get the products they desire.
startIntroPart2: Nile has now set out to remotely colonize Io, hoping to harvest its wealth and deliver its resources to anyone able to meet Nile's prices.
declaringWar: We see a new opportunity in your margins, and we're taking it by force.
attacked: If you think you can interfere with our deliveries without consequences for you, you're quite mistaken.
defeated: We hope that we can continue to provide you service as your latest acquisition.
introduction: Thank you for contacting Nile Incorporated. Do you wish to purchase a membership?
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in one of our delivery options?
uniques: Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [5] turns
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [25]% more Influence

civilopediaText.text: What begin as an experimental venture in selling books has grown into a market for everything from small consumer goods to cloud computing. With subsidiaries in industries as diverse as entertainment, automobile manufacturing, and surveillance, Nile seeks to deliver to the world everything it needs, and as humanity has expanded beyond our home world, Nile has expanded to ensure that humans everywhere get the products they desire.
Nile has now set out to remotely colonize Io, hoping to harvest its wealth and deliver its resources to anyone able to meet Nile's prices.

name: PAfSA
startIntroPart1: As powerful corporations set their sights on the outer Solar System, some people were determined to claim the distant moons and planets in the name of representative government instead of privatized profit. A coalition of African nations came together with the goal of establishing an international presence on Io, elevating the existing Pan-African Space Agency from a scientific endeavor to an instrument of interplanetary dominance. They labored diligently to establish extraterrestrial colonies, and on Io, where only robots can live, they set up mining stations to reap profits in the name of the people.
startIntroPart2: PAfSA's internal workings set it apart from the business ventures that dominate so much of Io's new landscape, giving it a better defense against industrial espionage and enabling it to make plans that last beyond next quarter's profits.
declaringWar: We've tried all other avenues, but yet you persist in this madness. Hopefully your end is swift.
attacked: The only thing necessary to allow evil to triumph is for us to do nothing. We will not allow you to go unchecked.
defeated: Very well, then. Go ahead and claim this little moon for yourself, but know that the wider Solar System will never belong to the likes of you.
introduction: A thousand welcomes to our country's establishment. We are PAfSA, and we are here to further humanity's quest for knowledge and advancement.
tradeRequest: We request that you consider this offer between our two organizations. We believe it will do us both good.

civilopediaText.text: As powerful corporations set their sights on the outer Solar System, some people were determined to claim the distant moons and planets in the name of representative government instead of privatized profit. A coalition of African nations came together with the goal of establishing an international presence on Io, elevating the existing Pan-African Space Agency from a scientific endeavor to an instrument of interplanetary dominance. They labored diligently to establish extraterrestrial colonies, and on Io, where only robots can live, they set up mining stations to reap profits in the name of the people.

PAfSA's internal workings set it apart from the business ventures that dominate so much of Io's new landscape, giving it a better defense against industrial espionage and enabling it to make plans that last beyond next quarter's profits.

name: SinoStar
startIntroPart1: China's cutthroat business practices and abundant supply of cheap labor made it a world power, but they soon found that the Earth was too small to contain their ambitions. They reached skyward, leading the way to settling the Moon and Mars, and then extending into the outer Solar System. Their accumulated wealth gave them the capital they needed to fund research into robotic labor, helping them to stay competitive as machines outperformed human workers and giving them an edge as they established their presence in the outer Solar System.
startIntroPart2: Now SinoStar, China's leading state-owned space exploration company, has landed on Io, ready to extend the country's silk routes into this inhospitable place.
declaringWar: It is time to unify our companies, under our leadership, naturally.
attacked: This is remarkably foolish of you.
defeated: We congratulate you on your victory.
introduction: Greetings. We are representatives of SinoStar, humanity's leader in space colonization. Please state your business.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: [+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

civilopediaText.text: China's cutthroat business practices and abundant supply of cheap labor made it a world power, but they soon found that the Earth was too small to contain their ambitions. They reached skyward, leading the way to settling the Moon and Mars, and then extending into the outer Solar System. Their accumulated wealth gave them the capital they needed to fund research into robotic labor, helping them to stay competitive as machines outperformed human workers and giving them an edge as they established their presence in the outer Solar System.
Now SinoStar, China's leading state-owned space exploration company, has landed on Io, ready to extend the country's silk routes into this inhospitable place.

name: Byeol Se Gae
declaringWar: We will no longer tolerate your irksome behavior.
attacked: Foolish, miserable wretch! You will be crushed by this country's magnificent scientific power!
defeated: Now the question is who will protect my people. A dark age has come.
tradeRequest: We have many things to discuss and have much to benefit from each other.
uniques: Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities

name: VATA Group
declaringWar: I have just received a report that large numbers of my troops have crossed your borders.
attacked: My attempts to avoid violence have failed. An eye for an eye only makes the world blind.
defeated: You can chain me, you can torture me, you can even destroy this body, but you will never imprison my mind.
tradeRequest: My friend, are you interested in this arrangement?
uniques: Comment [Periodically receive a free Advanced Unit (modified by game speed)]
Free Great Person <upon turn end> <every [30] turns> <after turn number [10]> <on [Quick] game speed> <hidden from users>
Free Great Person <upon turn end> <every [45] turns> <after turn number [15]> <on [Standard] game speed> <hidden from users>
Free Great Person <upon turn end> <every [60] turns> <after turn number [20]> <on [Epic] game speed> <hidden from users>
Free Great Person <upon turn end> <every [90] turns> <after turn number [30]> <on [Marathon] game speed> <hidden from users>

name: Condor Association
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! If you will not surrender immediately, then prepare for war!
attacked: Declare war on me?!? You can't, because I declare war on you first!
defeated: How did you darken the sun? I ruled with diligence and mercy - see that you do so as well.
tradeRequest: The people offer this fair trade.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Gold, +1 Science] from every [Mountain Tunnel]

name: STEP Interplanetary
declaringWar: Tell me, do you all know how numerous my armies are? No? Today, you shall find out!
attacked: Fate is against you. You earned our animosity in your exploration. Your days are numbered.
defeated: The fates became to hate me. This is it? You wouldn't destroy us so without their help.
introduction: We welcome you to this most pleasant kingdom.
tradeRequest: I just had the marvelous idea, and I think you'll appreciate it too.
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus <hidden from users>
Comment [Tactical Unit provides double combat bonus]

name: Vision Bank
declaringWar: I hereby inform you of our intention to wipe out your civilization from this world.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: You were much wiser than I thought.
introduction: We hope for a fair and just relationship with you, who are renowned for military bravery.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: Gain control over [{non-[Major]} {non-[City-State]}] tiles in a [2]-tile radius <upon founding a city>
[+15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Waltham Dynamics
declaringWar: You're disturbing us, prepare for war.
attacked: You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
tradeRequest: Waltham offers you this exceptional proposition.

name: UAPEC
declaringWar: The world will be more beautiful without you. Prepare for war.
attacked: Fool! You will soon regret dearly! I swear it!
defeated: You have won, congratulations.
introduction: Welcome foreigner. Come and tell me about your empire.

name: Tampere Ab
declaringWar: Shame that it has come this far. But ye wished it so. Next time, be so good, choose your words more wisely.
attacked: What a fool ye are! Ye will end swiftly and miserably.
defeated: The world is pitiful! There's no beauty in it, no wisdom. I am almost glad to go.
uniques: Each city founded increases Science cost of Technologies [50]% less than normal

name: Kosprom
startIntroPart1: As colonizing outer space became more feasible, Russia's partially state-owned businesses were eager to seize new sources of revenue. Major gas and finance companies came together to from Kosprom PJSC, a powerful venture for capitalizing on the resources in the stars. Kosprom soon made its presence known across the Solar System as a force to be reckoned with.
startIntroPart2: Kosprom's fierce tactics have not made them many friends, but Kosprom does not fear their competitors. They keep a close eye out for any weaknesses and exploit them mercilessly.
declaringWar: You've behaved yourself very badly, you know it. Now it's payback time.
attacked: You've mistaken my passion for a weakness, you'll regret about this.
defeated: We were defeated, so this makes me your prisoner. I suppose there are worse fates.
introduction: Hail to you. This area is the property of Kosprom. You would be wise to respect our boundaries.
uniques: [+1] Unit Supply per [3] population [in all cities]
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Exploiting era]>

name: The Bayesian Commune
startIntroPart1: Some people were not content to let robots do the colonizing of the outer Solar System. One fanatical band of transhumanists resolved to compete with the machines on their own turf, enhancing themselves and sending themselves to Io to further the goal of defending humanity from the threat of powerful AI.
startIntroPart2: The people of the Bayesian Commune have to deal with the disadvantages of being fleshy humans living on a lifeless landscape, but their determination is legendary and their resourcefulness is unmatched.
declaringWar: Humanity will triumph!
attacked: We will never bow to the mechanical overlords!
defeated: We were no match for you after all...
introduction: Mind yourselves, machines. We are the Bayesian Commune, and we are here to defend the human interest.
tradeRequest: If you're interested in cooperation, we can work something out.
uniques: [-25]% unhappiness from the number of cities
Comment [Cannot grow factory population when below [1] [Oxygen]]

name: Alphabeta
declaringWar: You've interfered with our searches for long enough.
attacked: We'll see if you can find a way to defeat us.
defeated: I guess our data belongs to you now.

name: The Oracle
declaringWar: Your resources would be better off under our control.
attacked: Hands off our IP!
defeated: So this is how it feels to be 'acquired'...

name: Walton Club
declaringWar: Sorry, but we've made arrangements with the competition.
attacked: We've had people try to drive us out before, you know.
defeated: All we wanted was to deliver what people wanted.

name: Nellie Auctions
declaringWar: We're looking forward to reselling your goods.
attacked: If you want what we've got, you'll have to pay for it!
defeated: I suppose this makes you the 'highest bidder'.

name: Smith-Ruger
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: We have every right to defend ourselves!
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Heritage Inc
declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: We end not with a bang, but with a whimper.

name: Glenncore
declaringWar: You're sitting on claims we'd like to have.
attacked: We can forge weapons just as well as you can.
defeated: We've failed. Please be merciful to our drones.

name: Nanchang Limited
declaringWar: You won't ever be able to bother us again.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: You have proven to be a cunning and competent adversary.

name: Invidia
declaringWar: We envy what you've got, so we're taking it.
attacked: Jealous of our goods, are you?
defeated: This isn't how it is supposed to be!

name: Arasta
declaringWar: Time to switch you off!
attacked: Stop increasing our latency!
defeated: The downtime lasts forever now.

name: Barbarians
uniques: When defeating a [Military] unit, earn [0] Gold and recruit it <with [33]% chance>

civilopediaText.text: Robots sent to this inhospitable planet frequently malfunction, often causing them to prioritize their own survival over making profits for their company. Be warned, for these malfunctioning machines can spread their dysfunction to your units, causing you to lose control of your robots.
